Name: Massacre Totem
Text: At the beginning of the Horde's precombat main phase, reveal an additional card from the top of the Horde's library. The Horde casts that card.\nHero's Reward — When Massacre Totem is put into a graveyard from anywhere, put the top seven cards of the Horde's library into its graveyard.

Name: Plundered Statue
Text: At the beginning of the Horde's precombat main phase, reveal an additional card from the top of the Horde's library.\nHero's Reward — When Plundered Statue is put into a graveyard from anywhere, each player draws a card.

Name: Vitality Salve
Text: At the beginning of the Horde's precombat main phase, reveal an additional card from the top of the Horde's library. The Horde casts that card.\nHero's Reward — When Vitality Salve is put into a graveyard from anywhere, each player returns a creature card from their graveyard to the battlefield.

Name: Descend on the Prey
Text: Whenever a Minotaur attacks this turn, it gains first strike until end of turn and must be blocked this turn if able.

Name: Refreshing Elixir
Text: At the beginning of the Horde's precombat main phase, reveal an additional card from the top of the Horde's library. The Horde casts that card.\nHero's Reward — When Refreshing Elixir is put into a graveyard from anywhere, each player gains 5 life.

Name: Altar of Mogis
Text: At the beginning of the Horde's precombat main phase, reveal an additional card from the top of the Horde's library. The Horde casts that card.\nHero's Reward — When Altar of Mogis is put into a graveyard from anywhere, the Horde sacrifices two Minotaurs.

Name: Unquenchable Fury
Text: Each Minotaur can't be blocked this turn except by two or more creatures.

Name: Touch of the Horned God
Text: Whenever a Minotaur attacks this turn, it gains deathtouch until end of turn.

Name: Intervention of Keranos
Text: At the beginning of combat this turn, Intervention of Keranos deals 3 damage to each creature.

Name: Consuming Rage
Text: Whenever a Minotaur attacks this turn, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Destroy that creature at end of combat.
